task_summary: The robot must reach the scissors while avoiding or pushing aside an obstacle blocking the path. Moment-by-moment visual evidence directs the plan to first perceive the scissors, align, actuate to move the obstacle, and finally approach the scissors.

task_long_description.overview: This episode takes place in an office-like environment with a white robotic arm, a visible obstacle (books), and a pair of scissors as the goal object. The robot must efficiently locate the scissors, plan approach paths around or by clearing the obstacle via pushing, and finally navigate to the scissors. Key constraints are collision avoidance and robust perception in clutter.
preconditions: Robot is powered on and homed
Workspace contains an obstacle between the robot and the scissors
Scissors are present and visible or discoverable via scanning
stepwise_plan: Check if scissors are visible; scan if not
Align robot with scissors for approach
Push obstacle aside to clear path
success_criteria: Robot is at the scissors without collision
Obstacle does not impede final approach
Scissors have been visually confirmed at target
failure_and_recovery: Failure: Obstacle not cleared — retry push or replan
Failure: Scissors not detected — retry ScanForTarget
Failure: Not at scissors — re-execute MoveTo
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the robot reaches the scissors and the obstacle no longer blocks the direct path.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the scissors

node_specs.description: Checks if scissors are currently visible.
Scans workspace for scissors using grid pattern.
Performs visual detection to localize scissors.
Moves to position above the scissors.
Approaches scissors and aligns within tight tolerance.
Moves to scissors after path is clear.
Verifies robot is at scissors target.

failure_modes: Robot collides with obstacle during push
Detection of scissors fails or gives false positive
recovery_strategy: Re-scan for scissors if not visible
Retry push with adjusted direction or force
assumptions: Scissors are present and distinguishable in workspace
Obstacle is movable by push; push direction_deg=90 assumed from robot pose in frames
No explicit gripper interaction with scissors in this episode — inferred from images

expected_success_criteria: Robot arrives at scissors with obstacle cleared
